    How to Change text font for whatsapp - Make stylish and inverted

    Posted on January 17, 2021 · Last updated January 21, 2021

    AJT7

    • Pros:

    • Add stylish fonts to increase ui like : ⓉⒽⒾⓈ 🇹 🇭 🇮 ​🇸 🌴♓🅸💲

    • Flip ( invert ) the text like : flipped: pǝddıƖɟ

    • Steps:

    1. Download ‘Fonts’ app for Stylish fonts. Enjoy the fonts Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.logan20.fonts_letrasparawhatsapp

    2. Download ‘Flip Text’ app from playstore. Share and enjoy Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.onoffme.fliptext
